backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the Kare2U backend with a hardcoded product catalog (9 skincare products across baby/adult categories) and blob storage mixin for file handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping the ShareModal/Header/Footer share-publish button update feature to its relevant source files and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the Kare2U frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme tokens (colors, borders, sidebar, charts).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Kare2U React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all page sections (Header, Hero, BrandValues, ProductCatalog, WhyKare2U, BrandStory, Footer) and provides smooth-scroll and tab-switching navigation handlers.
frontend/src/components/BrandStory.tsx: Two-column section presenting Kare2U's origin story with a brand illustration, floating accent cards, decorative leaf motifs, and key brand stats.
frontend/src/components/BrandValues.tsx: Horizontal grid section displaying four brand value tiles (Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Inspired, Natural Ingredients, Family-Safe) with icons on a soft blue background.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, social media icon buttons, navigation links, and a share/publish modal trigger. Includes decorative leaf motifs and a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed top navigation header with scroll-aware background, desktop nav links, mobile hamburger menu, and Publish/Shop Now CTA buttons that open a ShareModal or scroll to sections.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-width hero section with a background image, decorative leaf motifs, brand tagline, and two CTA buttons for shopping baby and adult product categories.
frontend/src/components/LeafMotif.tsx: SVG leaf decorative component with configurable color, size, opacity, and rotation props, plus a LeafCluster composite that layers three offset LeafMotif instances.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a single product with its image (or emoji fallback), price badge, name, description, and an Add to Cart button, using product type and category to resolve the correct asset.
frontend/src/components/ProductCatalog.t: Product listing section with Baby/Adult tabs, fetches all products via useAllProducts hook, and renders a responsive grid of ProductCards with skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/components/ShareModal.tsx: A modal dialog component that displays the live site URL with a copy-to-clipboard button and a QR code generated via Google Charts API for sharing.
frontend/src/components/WhyKare2U.tsx: A marketing section component that renders three feature cards (eczema-focused formula, clean ingredients, all-ages suitability) explaining the Kare2U brand value proposition.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login, logout, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching all products and products filtered by category from the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind layers, defines Kare2U brand CSS custom properties (oklch colors, radii, shadows), and registers utility classes for fonts and brand colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with Kare2U brand colors (oklch), custom fonts, border radii, box shadows, and animation keyframes, plus typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state version 3 for a feature update targeting the ShareModal component and share/publish button in Header and Footer. Contains one existing feature entry with requirement REQ-1 and no new feature requests or known issues.
